articles.author: Simnikiwe Xabanisa
articles.title: SA20 sensation Pretorius is something of a cricket tragic, according to his SA Under-19 coach
articles.description: Lhuan-dre Pretorius has begun his SA20 career with a disregard for reputations that has belied the fact that he's only 18. Mali Maketa, his coach at the SA Under-19s, says there's more to come.
articles.content: Lhuan-dre Pretorius has begun his SA20 career with a disregard for reputations that has belied the fact that he's only 18. Mali Maketa, his coach at the SA Under-19s, says there's more to come.

articles.title: Google’s Pichai Joins Tech CEOs in Bids for London Cricket Team
articles.description: Alphabet Inc. Chief Executive Officer Sundar Pichai is joining Silicon Valley executives bidding for a London-based cricket team, according to people familiar with the matter.
articles.content: Alphabet Inc. Chief Executive Officer Sundar Pichai is joining Silicon Valley executives bidding for a London-based cricket team, according to people familiar with the matter.

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Penalty after the batsman pleaded guilty to not reporting corrupt approaches | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
